content.en:
# Edit Profile

Your personal profile displays your picture and name throughout the system â€“ in the team overview, comments, and notifications. Keep your information current so your team can identify you instantly.

## What You Can Edit

On the profile page, you can change the following information:

- **Profile Picture:** A personal photo makes you recognizable to your team
- **Display Name:** Your name as it appears everywhere in CeleroPress
- **Phone Number:** Optional â€“ for direct contact by colleagues
- **Email Address:** Display only (cannot be changed here for security reasons)

## Edit Profile â€“ Step by Step

### Step 1: Open Profile Page

1. Click on **"ðŸ‘¤ Admin Center"** in the left sidebar
2. Select **"Manage Profile"** from the menu

[Screenshot: Navigation to profile area]

### Step 2: Upload or Change Profile Picture

1. In the **"Profile Picture"** section, you'll see your current image (or a placeholder with your initials)
2. Click **"Upload"** (or **"Change"** if an image already exists)
3. Select an image file from your computer:
   - **Allowed formats:** JPG, PNG, WebP
   - **Maximum size:** 10 MB
4. A cropping tool opens automatically
5. Drag and scale the image area until the desired section is in frame
6. Click **"Save"** to upload the cropped image

[Screenshot: Profile picture cropper with image selection]

> **Tip:** Choose a photo where your face is clearly visible. This helps your team identify you quickly â€“ especially in larger teams.

**Remove Profile Picture:**

If you want to delete your profile picture:

1. Click **"Remove"** (only visible if an image exists)
2. Your profile picture will be deleted and replaced with your initials

### Step 3: Update Personal Information

In the **"Personal Information"** section, you can edit your name and phone number:

1. **Display Name:** Enter your full name (e.g., "John Doe")
   - Minimum 2 characters required
   - Maximum 50 characters allowed
   - This name is displayed everywhere in the system (team list, comments, etc.)

2. **Phone Number:** Optional â€“ enter your phone number if desired
   - Format: e.g., "+1 123 456789" or "0123 456789"
   - Displayed in your profile so colleagues can reach you

3. Click **"Save"** to apply changes
4. A success message confirms your profile has been updated

[Screenshot: Personal information form with filled fields]

> **Important:** Your email address is displayed here but cannot be edited. It's linked to your account and can only be changed through account management for security reasons.

### Step 4: Review Changes

After saving:

- Your new profile picture appears immediately in the navigation (top right)
- Your updated name is displayed in the team overview
- Your new name is used in comments and activities

## Common Errors and Solutions

**"File is too large. Maximum 10MB allowed."**

Your selected image exceeds the maximum file size.

**Solution:**
- Compress the image before uploading (e.g., using online tools like TinyPNG)
- Choose a smaller image or reduce resolution

**"Display name must be at least 2 characters."**

The entered name is too short.

**Solution:**
- Enter your full first and last name
- Minimum 2 characters required

**"Please select an image file."**

You tried to upload an unsupported file.

**Solution:**
- Only image files are allowed: JPG, PNG, or WebP
- Convert your file to a supported format

## Using the Profile Picture Cropper Optimally

The cropper helps you choose the perfect image section:

1. **Zoom:** Use the zoom function to get closer to your face
2. **Position:** Drag the image until your face is centered in the frame
3. **Preview:** The preview shows how your image will look later
4. **Cancel:** Click "Cancel" if you want to select a different image

> **Tip:** Square images work best since the profile picture is displayed as a circle. Make sure your face is centered in the crop area.

## Additional Settings on the Profile Page

Besides personal information, you'll find other important functions on the profile page:

- **Email Verification:** Confirm your email address for additional security
- **Change Password:** Update your password regularly
- **Two-Factor Authentication:** Enable 2FA for maximum protection
- **Social Login:** Link your account with Google or other services
- **Account Information:** View your user ID, role, and organization

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Can I change my email address here?**

No, the email address is permanently linked to your account and cannot be changed directly on the profile page for security reasons. Contact support if you need to change your email.

**Will my profile picture be displayed in all organizations?**

Yes, your profile picture and name are account-wide and will be used in all organizations where you're a member.

**What happens if I delete my profile picture?**

Instead of the image, your initials will be displayed in a colored circle (e.g., "JD" for John Doe). This is an automatic fallback solution.

**How do others see my profile?**

Your profile picture and name appear:
- In the team overview under "Settings â†’ Team"
- In comments on projects and campaigns
- In notifications and activity logs
- In the sidebar (top right next to your name)

**Can I store multiple phone numbers?**

No, currently only one phone number per profile is possible. Enter the number where you're most easily reachable.

## Next Steps

Now that your profile is updated, you should:

- [Verify Email Address](/support/en/email-verification) â€“ Confirm your email for additional security
- [Enable Two-Factor Authentication](/support/en/two-factor-authentication) â€“ Protect your account optimally
- [Change Password](/support/en/change-password) â€“ Update your password regularly
- [Manage Team Members](/support/en/manage-team-members) â€“ See who else is in your organization
